Class Gift

java.lang.Object
  Gift

public class Gift
extends Object

A gift class contains information of it and provides methods to manipulate them. This class will cooperate with Customer class and Store class.

Author:
Xu Waycell, Way Studios
See Also:
Customer, Store

verifyCustomer

public boolean verifyCustomer(Customer customer,
                              int quantity)
Verify the given customer's capability to redeem the gift in a given quantity

Parameters:
customer - Given customer to verify
quantity - The quantity of gift that customer wanna redeem
Returns:
Return true if the customer is able to redeem or false when it is not
See Also:
